mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.qiuzhu_name as qiuzhuName ,a.liulangdongwu_types as liulangdongwuTypes ,a.qiuzhu_photo as qiuzhuPhoto ,a.qiuzhu_content as qiuzhuContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_lingyang as yonghuLingyang ,yonghu.yonghu_address as yonghuAddress ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM qiuzhu a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.qiuzhu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiuzhuName},'%')
and a.liulangdongwu_types = #{params.liulangdongwuTypes}
and a.qiuzhu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiuzhuContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_lingyang like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuLingyang},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuAddress},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
